title: 无法进入游戏[Client thread/INFO]: [net.minecraft.init.Bootstrap:func_179870_a...
author: RainyLily
txt_content: [Client thread/INFO]: [net.minecraft.init.Bootstrap:func_179870_a:553]: #@!@# Game crashed! Crash report saved to: #@!@# C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\Minecraft 1.12.2\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2020-03-26_18.47.50-client.txt

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
RainyLily 发表于 2020-3-26 18:59
怎么办啊！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！
更新你的显卡驱动

replies.author: reobf
replies.txt_content: 百度搜索 "windows7 硬件加速",把硬件加速拉满就行了,如果不行,那是你显卡不支持,更新驱动八成也是没有用的

replies.author: TBHHZYH
replies.txt_content: 应该是模块加载出错了，一般是配置低或电脑不行了，这种情况无中生有，灵感也不行
